Wait!Be on your guard! There is something strange afoot!1�
Back to the abyss, foul beast!�
A magical barrier prevents you from moving any closer.1�
You made it,  .1�
Just in time, too!You were about to be the lucky recipient of Lady Prishe's Punishment 'n Pain Special!1�
So this is the beastman barrier I've heard so much about?Hmph. Step aside and watch a professional at work.1�
Whoah! Get a load of this place!1�
Why did the beastmen bring that chunk of magicite here?1�
The poor bastard who found it woulda been pretty messed up, I'd say...1�
I s'pose you wouldn't know too much about that particular chunk of magicite.1�
The Emptiness sealed within made it unique.1�
You've heard about the magicite known as the Star of Tavnazia, right? And I bet you know that a piece of it was stolen and sold to Bastok before the war, too, right?1�
Well, an allied expedition came here to the Northlands thirty years ago bearing that chunk of magicite. Its members were poisoned by the voice of darkness sealed within the stone.1�
��Give in to thy desires.����Return to thy true self...��1�
That voice beckons to the darkness within us, over and over...1�
That's why the members of the expedition went a little loopy. You can't really blame them, though.1�
I mean, you would, too, if the Twilight God was whispering in your ear!1�
The voice of Promathia...?1�
What the...!?You eavesdropping again!?1�
You must tell me more of this tale.1�
I am Louverance N Mistalle.Francmage M Mistalle, Royal Knight and member of the allied expedition, was my grandfather.1�
Oh, so that's which one you are.In that case, I know all about you, too.1�
So, you've finally come back.Did you manage to avenge your grandfather's death?1�
How did you know about that!?Could it be that you're...?1�
You got it, buddy.It's your unlucky day. I'm Prishe, and this here's  .1�
You two...1�
Hehehe. I bet you've heard that nobody knows what to make of us, huh?1�
But, as that doesn't bother me one bit, you shouldn't let it bother you either.What I want to hear is the lowdown on the big boss behind the Kindred of the Northlands.1�
The Mithra seem to think that it's Promathia, but I know better than that.1�
So, who the hell is it?He's called the Divinity of Darkness by the beastmen, apparently.1�
I returned here to investigate that very fact...1�
The legends of the northern islands tell that the Divinity of Darkness slumbers in this land.1�
At some time in the past, the Shadow Lord followed the voice of this sleeping deity to its source.1�
His actions led by the powerful stone in the possession of the Shadow Lord, the Divinity of Darkness created an army of demons to enter the service of his visitor.1�
I think I'm starting to get it now. The being who the beastmen call Promathia is actually...1�
Tell me!I must know the truth!1�
Prishe!�
Wait!Be on your guard! There is something strange afoot!1�
Back to the abyss, foul beast!�
!I knew you were tough!1�
That guy definitely has an eye for adventurers.Talk about dumb luck!1�
What happened to the rrresting place of the sleeping god...?1�
You know of the divinity said to slumber here?1�
There should be an enormous crystal of darkness here.1�
It can't be...The beastman deity you speak of...!1�
Stay back!The voice of darkness will have you!1�
I will never forget that stone!It is the magicite that drove the allied expedition members to madness!1�
That stone is responsible for my grandfather's fate?1�
No!�
You've come back...1�
Welcome home, my little lost magicite...1�
Prishe!?�
I must follow my friend... I must learn the truth...1�
, I shall see you back in Bastok.May the light of Altana guide you on your journey.1�
Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, �[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.1�
Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?1�
I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.1�
Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.1�
What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.Flames for the Dead(pt.1).Flames for the Dead(pt.2).1�
Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.1�
